name: Hellbender (itch) (Diego Machado Baccili)
description:
Concept:

Hellbender is a redesign of the classic arcade Moon Patrol from 1983, with additional places and enemies to contend with, it also changes some mechanics of the classic arcade to make a new and unique experience for the player.

Story:

It is set in a fictional world where the devil has bikers and mafias working for him, in the midst of these thugs, there is one they call Hellbender, who is well known for his lack of responsibility for almost everything, and in his last job he destroyed accidentally one of these artifacts, this situation left him in debt to the devil, so he is jumping on this adventure, to collect three artifacts and redeem himself, otherwise his soul will be enslaved by the devil for eternity!
